headline.print_headline: New York Weighs Kids' Gay Conversion Therapy Ban
headline.main: New York Weighs Kids' Gay Conversion Therapy Ban

lead_paragraph: A proposed ban against New York health professionals trying to change a child's sexual orientation through therapy comes too late for Matthew Shurka, a 26-year-old Long Island man who says he remains emotionally scarred from five years of attempts to "cure" his homosexuality.
